faq.question: How much does it cost to run WordPress?
faq.answer: A small VM (~$6/month) handles most personal blogs and small business sites. High-traffic sites may need $20-50/month for better performance.

faq.question: Can I migrate my existing WordPress site?
faq.answer: Yes! Export your content from your current host and import it into your new self-hosted instance. Plugins and themes can be reinstalled.

faq.question: Is self-hosted WordPress secure?
faq.answer: Yes, when properly configured. We set up automatic security updates, SSL certificates, and firewall rules. Regular backups protect your data.

faq.question: Do you provide support?
faq.answer: We handle infrastructure issues. For WordPress-specific questions, the community forums and documentation are excellent resources.
